<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since SPIR-V cannot represent constant expression, constant expressions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in LLVM IR need to be lowered to instructions. For each function,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the constant expressions used by instructions of the function are replaced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by instructions placed in the entry block since it dominates all other BBs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each constant expression only needs to be lowered once in each function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and all uses of it by instructions in that function are replaced by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: remove redundant instructions for common subexpression.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">void <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-spirvregularizer-cpp-/spirvregularizer/#afc96d81c4b2ba8a3e77680438999aa40">SPIRVRegularizer</a>::runLowerConstExpr(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getContext();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::list&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt; WorkList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/atomicexpandpass-cpp/#a1bcc06b1cb86bd0ea08f33323190bdaa">instructions</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">    auto LowerOp = &#91;&amp;II, &amp;FBegin, &amp;F&#93;(Value &#42;V) -&gt; Value &#42; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">      if (isa&lt;Function&gt;(V))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">        return V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">      auto &#42;CE = cast&lt;ConstantExpr&gt;(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LLVM&#95;DEBUG(dbgs() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#91;lowerConstantExpressions&#93; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;CE);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ReplInst-&gt;insertBefore(InsPoint-&gt;getIterator());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LLVM&#95;DEBUG(dbgs() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; -&gt; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;ReplInst &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::vector&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt; Users;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not replace use during iteration of use. Do it in another loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">      for (auto U : CE-&gt;users()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LLVM&#95;DEBUG(dbgs() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#91;lowerConstantExpressions&#93; Use: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;U &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">        auto InstUser = dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;(U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only replace users in scope of current function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">        if (InstUser &amp;&amp; InstUser-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getParent() == &amp;F)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Users.push&#95;back(InstUser);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">      for (auto &amp;User : Users) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">        if (ReplInst-&gt;getParent() == User-&gt;getParent() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">            User-&gt;comesBefore(ReplInst))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ReplInst-&gt;moveBefore(User-&gt;getIterator());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">        User-&gt;replaceUsesOfWith(CE, ReplInst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      return ReplInst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    WorkList.pop&#95;front();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LowerConstantVec = &#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>, &amp;LowerOp, &amp;WorkList,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             &amp;Ctx&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantvector">ConstantVector</a> &#42;Vec,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumOfOp) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      if (std::all&#95;of(Vec-&gt;op&#95;begin(), Vec-&gt;op&#95;end(), &#91;&#93;(Value &#42;V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Expand a vector of constexprs and construct it back with</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SPIRVRegularizer::visitCallScalToVec(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;CI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> MangledName,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CI-&gt;getOperand(1) to a vector Arg0Ty. However, we use InsertElementInst</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and ShuffleVectorInst to generate the same code as the SPIR-V translator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For instance (transcoding/OpMin.ll), this call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call spir&#95;func &lt;2 x i32&gt; @&#95;Z3minDv2&#95;ii(&lt;2 x i32&gt; &lt;i32 1, i32 10&gt;, i32 5)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is translated to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %8 = OpUndef %v2uint</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %14 = OpConstantComposite %v2uint %uint&#95;1 %uint&#95;10</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %10 = OpCompositeInsert %v2uint %uint&#95;5 %8 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %11 = OpVectorShuffle %v2uint %10 %8 0 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %call = OpExtInst %v2uint %1 s&#95;min %14 %11</span></CodeLine>
